medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain began 4 days ago, starting in the left upper quadrant (LUQ) with acute onset. It was associated with 2 days of intermittent nausea and vomiting, not alleviated by anything and worsened with oral intake. For the last 3 days, the pain has settled in the epigastric and right upper quadrant (RUQ) areas.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HTN, Anxiety post hysterectomy, Chronic low back pain.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with breast cancer and hypertension; no family history of gastrointestinal cancers.
